entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this morning. Flurries and rain showers late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016
